links.title: Dow Stretches Losses to 560 Points at Lows
links.description: BRIEFING.COM] Stocks add to today's losses with all three major averages at intraday lows as investors have seemingly not forgotten the tariff dialogue which took place earlier in the week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average is the worst performer to this point, down 2.4%.
